scripts.dots: budo ./dots/index.js -l -o --title "Ait REPL" -- -g uglifyify -t brfs -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] ] -t envify -t uglifyify
scripts.web: budo ./web/index.js -l -o --title "Ait REPL" -- -g uglifyify -t brfs -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] ] -t envify -t uglifyify
scripts.bundle: browserify ./web/index.js -o bundle.js -t brfs -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] ] -t uglifyify -g uglifyify
